thread.title: Ryan Giggs moves mum out of £1.5m mansion into three-bed semi so he has somewhere to live after divorce
thread.title_full: Ryan Giggs moves mum out of £1.5m mansion into three-bed semi so he has somewhere to live after divorce

author: Richard Wheatstone
title: Ryan Giggs moves mum out of £1.5m mansion into three-bed semi so he has somewhere to live after divorce
text:
Ryan Giggs will continue to live on the semi street as wife Stacey and his two kids (Photo: Getty) Share Get   
Ryan Giggs has moved his mum out of her £1.5m mansion into a three-bed semi down the road so he has somewhere to live after his divorce is finalised tomorrow - it has been reported. 
The Manchester United legend owns the five-bed house in Worsley, Greater Manchester, that mum Lynne, 61, has lived in for 15 years. 
It is on the same street at the £3m home he shared with estranged wife Stacey, 38, and where their two children are being raised. 
Stacey filed for divorce amid rumours around Giggs' alleged infidelity following previous affairs with model Imogen Thomas and his brother Rhodri's wife Natasha. Read More Giggs has moved out of his £3m family home (Photo: Splash News) Giggs' mum will now move to a three-bed semi down the road 
The Sun reports Giggs will move in to his mum's house so he can be close to his kids while giving Stacey some space. 
Giggs purchased a three-bed semi around two miles away for £275,000 in October last year, where Lynne will now reportedly live. 
A source told the paper: "Giggs packed his bags and sought refuge in his mum’s house to give Stacey some space, while still being close enough to their kids. Giggs' mum Lynne will now move into the £275,000 semi (Photo: Paul Cousans/ZENPIX) 
"But now he’s made the move permanent. It’s good for them as he’s only two minutes down the road to check in on their kids. 
"Stacey has been doing everything she can to move on with her life and make the most of her independence. Lynne is the one who has really lost out after being given her marching orders." 
The nine-year marriage is expected to officially come to an end at a hearing tomorrow. Read More Ryan Giggs and wife Stacey's divorce is expected to go through tomorrow (Photo: Mark Cuthbert/UK Press via Getty) Ryan Giggs is English football's most decorated player (Photo: Daily Mirror) 
Giggs, 43, is the most decorate footballer in the history of English football having won 13 Premier League titles, four FA Cups and two Champions League crowns. 
He currently co-owns National League North side Salford City FC and has recently made several appearances as a TV pundit. Like us on Facebook
